it.crs4.most.ehrlib

Class WidgetProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.crs4.most.ehrlib.WidgetProvider

  • public class WidgetProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class WidgetProvider.
    Author:
    smonni A WidgetProvider is a utility class that builds a set of visual and iteractive widgets corresponding to a specific Archetype. The Archetype description is specified by a set of json structures, to be provided to the class constructor.

    • Field Summary

      WidgetProvider(Context context, java.lang.String jsonDatatypes, java.lang.String jsonOntology, java.lang.String jsonInstances, java.lang.String jsonLayoutSchema, java.lang.String language)
      Setup a Widget provider representing a specific archetype, according to the specified json archetype datatypes, structure and ontology.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FormContainer buildFormView(int index)
      build a view containing all widgets according to the json archetype structure, layout and ontology, All widgets are rendered in a vertical layout, optionally ordered by section and/or item priority (if specified in the layout json schema) (This method first calls the buildSectionWidgets(String[]) methods on all archetype sections (or on the sections provided by the layout schema , if provided).
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<DatatypeWidget<EhrDatatype>>> buildSectionWidgets(java.lang.String[] sections)
      Builds a Map of widgets, according to the provided archetype json schema, where each key is an archetype section and the corresponding values are an oredered list of widgets corresponding to the underluying EHR datatypes.

    • Field Detail

      • defaultLayoutParams

        public static final LayoutParams defaultLayoutParams

    • Constructor Detail

      • WidgetProvider

        public WidgetProvider(Context context,
                      java.lang.String jsonDatatypes,
                      java.lang.String jsonOntology,
                      java.lang.String jsonInstances,
                      java.lang.String jsonLayoutSchema,
                      java.lang.String language)
               throws JSONException
        Setup a Widget provider representing a specific archetype, according to the specified json archetype datatypes, structure and ontology.
        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        jsonDatatypes - - the json description of all datatypes used by this archetype, subdivided in sections
        jsonOntology - - the json ontology (it includes a textual description of each item of the archetype)
        jsonInstances - - the initial json structure of the archetype (optionally including initial values)
        jsonLayoutSchema - (optional, it can be null) the layout schema containing informations about visual rendering (sections, custom widgets, priorities..)
        language - - the ontology language
        Throws:
        JSONException - the JSON exception

    • Method Detail

      • updateOntologyLanguage

        public void updateOntologyLanguage(java.lang.String lang)
        Update the ontology on all datatype widgets.
        Parameters:
        lang - the language code

      • getSections

        public java.lang.String[] getSections()
        Get the sections of this archetype structure.
        Returns:
        the sections

      • buildSectionWidgets

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<DatatypeWidget<EhrDatatype>>> buildSectionWidgets(java.lang.String[] sections)
                                                                                                throws InvalidDatatypeException
        Builds a Map of widgets, according to the provided archetype json schema, where each key is an archetype section and the corresponding values are an oredered list of widgets corresponding to the underluying EHR datatypes.
        Parameters:
        sections - the array of sections to build (if null is provided, all sections of the provided archetype are built)
        Returns:
        the map of widgets
        Throws:
        InvalidDatatypeException - the invalid datatype exception

      • buildFormView

        public FormContainer buildFormView(int index)
                            throws InvalidDatatypeException
        build a view containing all widgets according to the json archetype structure, layout and ontology, All widgets are rendered in a vertical layout, optionally ordered by section and/or item priority (if specified in the layout json schema) (This method first calls the buildSectionWidgets(String[]) methods on all archetype sections (or on the sections provided by the layout schema , if provided).
        Parameters:
        index - the index
        Returns:
        the FormContainer containing all widgets, ordered by section and item priority in a vertical layout
        Throws:
        InvalidDatatypeException - the invalid datatype exception

      • getSectionWidgets

        public java.util.List<DatatypeWidget<EhrDatatype>> getSectionWidgets(java.lang.String section,
                                                                     int itemIndex)
                                                              throws InvalidDatatypeException
        Builds a list of widgets from a specific section and item index.
        Parameters:
        section - the section
        itemIndex - the index of the archetype instance to be created
        Returns:
        a list of datatype widgets of the "data" substructure
        Throws:
        InvalidDatatypeException - the invalid datatype exception

      • updateSectionsJsonContent

        public void updateSectionsJsonContent(int index)
                               throws JSONException
        Update the json structure according to the current value of the datatype widgets belonging to this form.
        Parameters:
        index - the form index
        Throws:
        JSONException - the JSON exception

      • getOntology

        public static JSONObject getOntology(java.lang.String data,
                                     java.lang.String language)
        Get the ontology .
        Parameters:
        data - the ontology schema (including all available languages)
        language - the selected language
        Returns:
        a json object containing the ontology of the specified language
